text: Question from someone not really in this field: If I am simulating a spreading process across the surface of the earth, at what scale do I need to start caring about the curvature of the earth?

text: That depends on your coordinate system. If it's locally projected and you stay within the valid bounds, it's probably fine. Or using an equal area projection would work as well. If you use lat lons, it's only fine at the equator.
